body:
### Welcome to the SIRE Project
I aim to provide a platform to automagically (as in breathtakingly simple) deploy on bare metal a robust decentralized distributed container-based suite of prebuilt dynamically configured clustered services and applications.

### Support or Contact
@braderhart
